text: Hubertus Leteng (; 1 January 1959 â€“ 31 July 2022) was an Indonesian Roman Catholic bishop. He was the Bishop of Ruteng from 2010 to October 2017. He resigned because of scandals about theft and of having a mistress. Leteng was born in Ruteng, Indonesia. Leteng died on 31 July 2022 in Bandung, Indonesia of a heart attack at the age of 63.Uskup Emeritus Keuskupan Ruteng Mgr. title: Hubertus Leteng
